author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

#36754, supposedly a backport of #35938, was merged with some minor updates with respect to the version integrated in the master.
Since I asked (probably reacting a bit too fast...) for those updates in the 10_6 version, I feel committed somehow to synchronize now the master version of LHEGenericMassFilter to what was backported

#### PR validation:

It builds correctly
title: Synchronize LHEGenericMassFilter with the latest updates merged in 10_6
